Uses of ServiceException in jeus.security.spi
 

Subclasses of ServiceException in jeus.security.spi
 class GroupNotExistsException
          Created by IntelliJ IDEA.
 class PolicyNotExistsException
          설정된 Policy 가 Repository에 존재하지 않을때 AuthorizationRepsitoryServices 의해 던져진다.
 class SubjectNotExistsException
          설정된 Subject가 Repository에 존재 하지않을때, AuthenticationRepsitoryServices 메소드에 의해 던져진다.
